body:
Every four years (or five, #2021) we get a really unique betting opportunity.

The Olympics. 

Roughly 400 events to bet on, consisting of sports, athletes and countries (!) we've barely heard of. 

The fun part about the Olympics is that the sportsbook traders have as much idea as you.

Which means two things:

1. You can find an edge with a little research
2. You won't be able to bet big because the sportsbooks limit their exposure

Now we've been betting through about four Olympics and have learnt some hard lessons along the way.

We'll try to pass those along here and add some tipping accounts/resources to follow as the 2021 Tokyo Olympics gets ready to launch.
